pageContext.claim: “In the state of Texas alone, according to the Texas Department of Public Safety, between 2011 and 2018, more than 663,000 crimes were committed by illegal immigrants.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeats a long-debunked claim from 2014, probably because he heard it on Fox News from allies such as Sean Hannity. The data show that about 200,000 immigrants -- who may or may not be in the United States illegally -- faced 642,000 charges. Not all charges lead to convictions. According to the website of the Texas Department of Public Safety, between 2011 and 2018, 184,000 undocumented immigrants in Texas have been charged with more than 288,000 criminal offenses.
